data.title: Newark Airport Shuttle
data.meta_description: GO Airlink offers reliable and affordable Newark Airport Shuttle services to and From EWR. There is no easier or more economical way to get around the city.
data.text:
Shared Ride

You will receive a text message upon arrival. Click the link in the text message to receive instructions on meeting your driver. After collecting your bags, proceed to the Welcome Center, and press the Ready Now button to be connected with your vehicle.

If you have issues, please proceed to the Welcome Center in your arriving terminal and call extension#18 using one of the courtesy phones to connect directly with Go Airlink NYC.

Private Service

You will receive a text message upon arrival. Click the link in the text message to receive instructions on meeting your driver. After collecting your bags, proceed to the Welcome Center, and press the Ready Now button to be connected with your vehicle.

If you selected Meet & Greet service, your greeter will be in contact with you upon arrival.

If you have issues, please proceed to the Welcome Center in your arriving terminal and call extension#18 using one of the courtesy phones to connect directly with Go Airlink NYC.
